_data_sources.per_cap_spend: NASC/Technomic 2023 college venue benchmarks: football overall avg $12-$15; student ~40-55% of general. Midpoints used.
_data_sources.gross_margins: Aramark 10-K filings, NASC 2023: blended 60-68%; fountain beverages 85-92%; student segment lower mix.
_data_sources.adjustments: NASC/Aramark/Technomic published modifier ranges (cold weather, night games, promotions). Midpoints of published ranges.
_data_sources.methodology: All values represent per-attendee averages across Ohio State home games. Student per-cap is lower due to budget constraints and lower alcohol purchasing. Non-student includes premium/suite contributions blended down.

student._source: NASC: student spend ~40-55% of general; at $15.50 non-student, student = $6-8.50. Midpoint $7.50

nonstudent._source: NASC/Technomic 2023: Big Ten football avg $14-$18 non-student per-cap. Midpoint $15.50. Margin from Aramark 10-K.

_sources.cold_weather: Aramark/Delaware North: +8-12% below 45F from hot beverage surge. Midpoint 10%.
_sources.night_game: Technomic 2022: +5-8% for night games (longer dwell time, more alcohol). Midpoint 6%.
_sources.student_push: ESTIMATED: -4% to -8% per-cap when student ratio rises (lower individual spend). Midpoint 5%.
_sources.family_bundle: ESTIMATED: -3% to -6% per-cap from discounted bundles. Midpoint 5%.
_sources.alumni_night: ESTIMATED: +2% to +5% from premium alumni spending patterns. Midpoint 4%.
_sources.rivalry_hype: ESTIMATED from REAL: +5% to +12% rivalry per-cap boost (early arrival, celebration). Midpoint 8%.

sport_multipliers._source: NASC: basketball/indoor per-cap is 85-90% of football. Baseball/soccer further reduced.
